long_description: The REI Quantum Brief offers professionals and travelers a smart option for carrying 15 in. laptops in a TSA checkpoint-friendly design and the ability to securely carry the brief on wheeled luggage. Fits most 15.6 in. laptops and is designed to be TSA checkpoint-friendly: dedicated rear pocket opens flat to allow laptop to remain inside during security screening. Main compartment is sized to carry letter-size documents and file folders. Interior mesh pocket expands to varying sizes and fits up to 1-liter water bottles. Fully featured front organizer pocket holds pens, electronics and small essentials; key clip. Shoulder strap offers sliding shoulder pad and easy length adjustments, and is removable; top carry handle. Cordura(R) nylon fabric offers superior abrasion resistance and tear strength; fabric is coated for water resistance and durability. Reflective trim enhances visibility in dusk/dark conditions; web loop holds blinky light (sold separately). REI Quantum Brief slides over wheeled luggage pull handles for secure attachment, getting you through the airport smoothly and easily.
short_description: The REI Quantum Brief offers professionals and travelers a smart option for carrying 15 in. laptops in a TSA checkpoint-friendly design and the ability to securely carry the brief on wheeled luggage.
